amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the National Endowment for the Humanities by $5 million and increases funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $10 million and decreases Department of the Interior Departmental Management Salaries and Expenses funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase (by transfer) the amount appropriated for National Endowment for the Humanities-Grants and Administration by $5 million, and the amount for Challenge America Arts Fund-Challenge America Grants, by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 192 (Roll no. 310).
